Calculator v2.name: Calculator v2
Calculator v2.description: Your task is to finally finish 'Calculator v2' project.
Calculator v2.phrase: I don't give a shit, motherfaka, cmon lets do calculator on c++

SQL Bootcamp.name: SQL Bootcamp
SQL Bootcamp.description: You need to begin SQL Bootcamp withoun delays.
SQL Bootcamp.phrase: If SQL doesn't kill you, nothing will. Time to suffer!

Containers.name: Containers
Containers.description: It's time to finish the most resource-consuming project - prepare to weeks od slepless nights.
Containers.phrase: Containers: because life's too short for easy projects.

Fix Legacy Code.name: Fix Legacy Code
Fix Legacy Code.description: Your task is to fix the legacy code that nobody understands. Good luck with that mess!
Fix Legacy Code.phrase: Oh, so you think you can fix this ancient code? Hahaha, good luck!

Refactor Monolith.name: Refactor Monolit
Refactor Monolith.description: Refactor the monolithic codebase that has more spaghetti than an Italian restaurant.
Refactor Monolith.phrase: Ready to dive into the monolith? Prepare for a nightmare!

CICD Project.name: CICD Project
CICD Project.description: Your task for now is to finish Devops branch - so finish last Devops' project.
CICD Project.phrase: CICD: Because you didn't hate yourself enough already.

Debug Infinite Loop.name: Debug Infinite Loop
Debug Infinite Loop.description: Identify and fix the infinite loop that causes the system to crash every 5 minutes.
Debug Infinite Loop.phrase: Caught in an infinite loop? Better find that bug before it drives you mad!

Upgrade Deprecated Libraries.name: Upgrade Deprecated Libraries
Upgrade Deprecated Libraries.description: Update all deprecated libraries to their latest versions and hope nothing breaks.
Upgrade Deprecated Libraries.phrase: Upgrading deprecated libraries, huh? Brace yourself for a rollercoaster!

Fix Security Vulnerability.name: Fix Security Vulnerability
Fix Security Vulnerability.description: Patch the security vulnerability that's been exploited by every hacker on the planet.
Fix Security Vulnerability.phrase: A security vulnerability, you say? Get ready for a wild ride through the dark web!

Optimize Database Queries.name: Optimize Database Queries
Optimize Database Queries.description: Refactor inefficient SQL queries to improve database performance.
Optimize Database Queries.phrase: Database queries slowing you down? Time to speed things up!

Create RESTful API.name: Create RESTful API
Create RESTful API.description: Develop a RESTful API for managing user data with proper authentication.
Create RESTful API.phrase: Building an API? Don’t forget to lock the doors with authentication!

Implement Responsive Design.name: Implement Responsive Design
Implement Responsive Design.description: Make the website mobile-friendly by implementing responsive design principles.
Implement Responsive Design.phrase: Responsive design, eh? Let’s make that website shine on all devices!

Automate Testing Suite.name: Automate Testing Suite
Automate Testing Suite.description: Create automated tests to ensure code quality and reduce manual testing efforts.
Automate Testing Suite.phrase: Time to automate those tests! Manual testing is so last season.

Integrate Third-Party Service.name: Integrate Third-Party Service
Integrate Third-Party Service.description: Integrate a third-party service for payments to streamline transactions.
Integrate Third-Party Service.phrase: Integrating payments? Don’t let those transactions fall through the cracks!

Migrate Legacy Code.name: Migrate Legacy Code
Migrate Legacy Code.description: Migrate the legacy codebase to a modern framework and improve maintainability.
Migrate Legacy Code.phrase: Legacy code, huh? Time to give it a much-needed makeover!

Build a Single Page Application.name: Build a Single Page Application
Build a Single Page Application.description: Create a single-page application using React or Vue.js with a smooth user experience.
Build a Single Page Application.phrase: Single page applications are the future! Let’s make it seamless!

Develop Interactive Game.name: Develop Interactive Game
Develop Interactive Game.description: Create a simple interactive game using HTML5 and JavaScript.
Develop Interactive Game.phrase: Game development? Let’s bring your ideas to life!

Create Data Visualization Dashboard.name: Create Data Visualization Dashboard
Create Data Visualization Dashboard.description: Build an interactive dashboard using D3.js or Chart.js to visualize data trends.
Create Data Visualization Dashboard.phrase: Data visualization is key! Let’s make those insights pop!

Build a Mobile Game.name: Build a Mobile Game
Build a Mobile Game.description: Develop a mobile game using Unity or Godot with engaging gameplay mechanics.
Build a Mobile Game.phrase: Mobile games are the way to go! Let’s captivate your audience!

Perform Exploratory Data Analysis.name: Perform Exploratory Data Analysis
Perform Exploratory Data Analysis.description: Analyze a dataset to discover patterns and insights using Python and Pandas.
Perform Exploratory Data Analysis.phrase: Data analysis awaits! Let’s uncover hidden gems!

Create Machine Learning Model.name: Create Machine Learning Model
Create Machine Learning Model.description: Build and train a machine learning model using scikit-learn to predict outcomes.
Create Machine Learning Model.phrase: Ready to dive into machine learning? Let’s predict the future!

Provide Feedback on Peer’s Project.name: Feedback on Peer’s Project
Provide Feedback on Peer’s Project.description: You task is to provide your honest opinion on peer's work. Find Odiswhis and help her with her project.
Provide Feedback on Peer’s Project.phrase: Tear apart your peer's dreams with some 'constructive' feedback.

Get internship.name: Internship
Get internship.description: You task is to finally get internship. Go talk to ADM.
Get internship.phrase: Get an internship or keep living with your parents. Your choice.

Return Karnaksp's item.name: Item's return
Return Karnaksp's item.description: You took t-shirt item from ADM for peer Karnaksp. Please, return it to him
Return Karnaksp's item.phrase: Someone have just bought and item in school 21 shop...

Gift for a Peer.name: Gift for a Peer
Gift for a Peer.description: Today you woke up in a great mood. You decided to give away stikers to the first Peer you meet.
Gift for a Peer.phrase: Someone needs to be cheered up!
